title: Braised rabbit with fennel and pastis and chickpea purée
description: Pastis and fennel is the perfect combination to complement the richness of this slow-cooked rabbit.
ingredients: 1 x 1.5kg/3lb 5oz farmed rabbit (ask your butcher to joint the rabbit into 2 legs, 2 shoulders, with the saddle and rack cut into 4. Keep the kidneys intact)
1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tbsp roughly chopped fennel tops or fresh dill, to serve
